https://tmrev.io/movie/543745-A Raunchy Christmas Story 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yisbpoZOfJMmgPIcdymlCrtq68s.jpg Dave seems doomed to a lonely life of eating ramen noodles alone on Friday nights forever, but Christmas magic is afoot. And no Russian spies, disgruntled bosses, or horny bakery scientists can defeat the Yuletide spirit. Sex, lies, and more sex, the things that make Christmas great. A Raunchy Christmas Story
